Blog.post: ARGH!!!!!!!! I duno.. I'm stressing sia.. I hate my mum so much now.. lyk last tym lyk tat but much more!!! Argh.. Who does she think she is? Juz becoz of wat happened 2 me dad she can treat me worser den a maid sia.. wat u think i 2 scared 2 run away isit? THink twice hor.. Coz who mite now I mite fall 2 suicide n blame everythin on u!!!!! ARGH!!!!!!!!! aiya so stress la.. now dun dare tok abt it.. 4got.. All i kno is i hate her 2 the core..!!!!!!!!

okok 2day my day kinda sucked.. I went 2 the library @ pasir ris 2 borrow a book den went Mc Donalds den Popular to buy more assesment books only maths.. yeah that's the only subject that i lyk 2 assessment books. lame huh? Well around 7 2nite will be watchin that Kumar show "not guity" not sure whether good anot but cost around $80+ for each person sia.. I'm goin wif hazah dey all.. but i feel a bit sick sia but i dun wana waste money lata my mother will sure kill me.. Err.. not so excited.. Aiya lame ordy yea.. so gona go now..

heyz duno today i cum home play com den sleep for 4 hrs watch a lil tv den now bak on the com.. I also toked to Colin today and it made me think. I really miss the old san yu school days. Depressed. I miss Paulene so much.. I luv u babe if u eva see this. I really worried for her you know? I duno is it CCSS is really beta for me? So that i dun havta see whats-her-face. I don't havta put off with all that shit ya? Oh yea u kno wat Cheryl lim got confronted by Amanda.. haha.. it so happened she changed her numba.. Haha dun worry i got her new no. ordy.. I have my wayz to get wat i want. Gosh all she does is keep touchin her hair.It is so disgustin lor.. it's not lyk once or twice in an hr it's lyk every 3 mins.. haha. i boliao n count.. stupid.. Gosh i duno y hate her & tat acting butch so much.. I juz do. Maybe coz i'm still not ova the grp thing.. I'm not angry wif the guyz tho only them.. maybe that acting bung is juz a grp wreaker coz her previous grp can't have her anymore n tries to ruins othas.. n that nosy bitch can't u juz hav ya own life n stop priving into mine! So wat if i have bf.. ya business arz? y u so need 2 kno one? BTW I lied i don't. I said i did coz lata u go spread that rumor that i lyk tat guy juz becoz he & me walk 2getha.. doesn't mean i lyk him ok! Oh yeah tat David who ask my numba dis mornin msg me.. haha i reply late tho coz i only see wen slpin but who carez... okok i fedup typin ordy *byebye*

since afta exams i thot i will will hav less stress n thingz on my mond but it only made it worse.. 2day @ skel I was listenin 2 "the thought of the day" it made me realize that i am seriously running frm reality.. y? coz mayb i dun wish 2 accept wad is happenin n want my life on track? how can i ? I admit I'm a rich bithy spoilt brat well that's wad i want 2 be but i can't anymore.. i havta learn my wayz.. m i selfish? 4 godness crikey it's my dad were tokin abt?! hav i becom those eveil vilian on tv? ARGH!! is all i want 2 say but can't only 2 myself.. i want 2 go 2 a beach or sumthin n juz scream.. I'm abt 2 go haywire! i wana cry lyk i nvr cried b4 i want 2 let this thing go. I need 2 sonfide in mook but now she hates me coz of the bishen thing.. wad 2 do? i can't tell paulene coz she will worry 2 much 4 me.. I told alvis haf e story but not all.. i dun wan ppl 2 console or pity me! I juz wan it all out or sumthin.. every single day i wake up crying.. i wan my life bak!! giv it bak! I thot only these thingz happened in movies.. i din no it'll really happened 2 me? wad hav i becum? I'm now crying while typin this blog.. gOd abOve giB me bK my daddy! i pray so hard! pLz.. bless him & make suRe he doEs ok.. I lOvE hiM so MucH.. God I nevr ask u 4 anything so major plz help me ot I'm afraid i will come n join u..everytym i havta take sleepy pills 2 go 2 slp how much more do i havta take 2 get proper slp? I can't slp in claz anymore no mata how tired i am all i think is u.. :'( ARGH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! aiya plz 2 e gal who keep privin in2 my business stay out i will never tell u wad happened 2 me! NEVER! gosh dun u have a life? stop be nosy in otha life 4 godness sake.. others r fed up wif u, u kno? gOsh ya so boliao isit? I tellin u.. stay out coz lately i will be hot-tempted.. i dun care wad othaz say abt me but if anyone fuKz in2 my life I will hell sure will not gib face one.. i duin care whether i die or not.. cOz my life is now worthless k!!!! sO fuCK OFF!!!!!!!!!!!

2day went to go 2 plaza singapura for Hugh's show.. it wasn't big @ all man.. I thot it was some big little thing but it was 10x less than the taka show more borin a bit 2.. went there 2 support my bro.. i 4got 2 brign my hp liao.. big mistake coz it was so boring man.. lyk when my bro doin rehersals & make up I had nothin 2 do! sO i wnt 2 walk walk around lehz.. forgot 2 ask my step-dada 4 $$money.. anotha big mistake.. den i orso 4got how 2 find my parents agen!! din bring hp & no way will i use e public fone.. so in e end i did see them @ e show.. yupx.. also saw tat pounch design i wanted but not e design of teddy were out of stock der.. gosh so many shop out of stock arz? den only got e playboy design so cloz 2 buy lehz.. den 4got 2 ask 4 $$ stupid!!! haha.. den afta watch did grocrey shoppin den duno in cranky mood den my step-dada bought me vodka.. hehe.. as long drink in e hse can lor.. got 4 pack.. hehe.. Err.. went out 4 mmore shoppin den went home.. den slp.. also saw happy now.. coz ewn i went shoppin wiof my frienz aftawards i went wif my bro modellin shows ppl.. dun wory dey lyk around 15-17 so handsome liao! hehehe.. but nvr get no. 4got my hp.. so pei seh 2 ask.. haha.. dey ask 4 mine.. but i din really wanted 2 giv.. i only wan theirs hehehe...

okok 2day wasn't my bez day.. waz so cranky dis mornin.. was quite excited 2 go 2 plaza singpura 2day coz can get money out of hre 2 get a new bag & shoes den duno my mum wan me catch taxi wif her der.. it was lyk 9:30 n she expected me 2 get ready in 10mins!! plz hor.. i juz woken up @ 9:00 n she made me chat wif her abt e concert she went 2 lastnite.. den hor.. i haven't even done anythin.. juz out of bed den tok 2 her.. i havne't even brush my teeth yet! dun worry i have ordy la! yea.. she kept tokin 2 9:30 den i went to brush my teeth get ready.. den wanted 2 watch cartoons.. i kno bit childish but hack carez.. den hor i decided 2 met her lata.. coz she muz take my lil bro 2 fashion show mahz.. aiya.. she getz angry & ask me not 2 go.. dun even bother n all that crap.. so i'm yelled out so fucked then.. then lat 2 hrs lata wen she was der she called me on my hp.. i nvr ans coz on silent nvr hear deni called hre lyk 2 hrs afta she called askin me 2 go but now dun bother! wHat E heLL?? aiya.. so fukstrated la!! Den dey all go home got naggin coz hse became messy:x den duno hav aftanoon nap den i still cranky tat din want 2 eat whole day sia!! till now dun wan 2 eat! i orso din go 2 tat stupid party downstairs.. so mum's more angry but hack care la.. but tml antha day rite? so hack care lorz..
